alfredsnippet.snippet:
Gerrit L. Verschuur, "Revising the Truth," Science Digest (August, 1981), p.29

"If we look at the physical universe the way astronomers do, we may never know anything about it.  The recent U.S. planetary probes revealed a shocking paucity of real knowledge about the contents of the cosmos."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Recent US Planetary Probes Reveal Paucity of Real Knowledge
